document_data.name: ''Lunar Crown''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lunar Crown''''' and an enchanted [[cleric]]'s [[circlet]] from [[Waterdeep]], in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: ''Lunar crowns'' were metallic [[silver]]y circlets of bulky size. They offered protection to the wearer's forehead and with its two side guards, to the wearer's ears. The front of the circlet was decorated with an image of a side-turned crescent.
document_data.Powers: ''Lunar crowns'' enhanced the wearer's ''[[heal]]ing'' magic, turning a simple healing spell into ''[[mass cure wounds]]''.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Halbenet Soladonel]]: a [[moon elf]] [[cleric]] of [[Corellon Larethian]] who worked with other warriors of [[Waterdeep]], performing missions on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
